text: UOB one for household expense. Citi rewards amaze for shopping  dinning and other online transactions. UOB Lady for travel related. I choose travel category

Undestood. Lady will be my primary card to spend and clock the min $500 uob one requirement and also to gain miles. Start slow first since i not in urgent need of miles yet haha. And i dun frequent travel  prob 2-3 times per year

Just take note UOB lady card has 1k limit for applying the bonus. But you probably wonâ€™t exceed at this stage based on your spending pattern. When you start shopping  eating outside more etc  then you can consider Citi rewards

no additional charge if use 'pay bill'

Hello I have a question - let's say when I turn 55 and still working  but my SA already hit ERS... Will my SA exceed the ERS limit from salary contribution?
Continue to be in SA before 55. Above 55  SA up to FRS will transfer to RA  the rest will go to OA.

Yes  by luck. The $888 cashback got credited to moomoo balance next day then I can withdrew it to bank account immediately.I just tested selling all dbs shares. In total there are fees of $4.76  to buy moomoo shares and another fees of $4.80 to sell shares. Total $9.56 to pay moomoo
I thought the SA account will be closed upon 55?
Ok so after 55 yr old  we will have OA  RA and MA right? So if I am still working  will part of my salary still go into RA? Even if my RA already achieved ERS?
For this  need to wait for actual data points during next CPF contribution. Though I would assume the excess flows to OA  just like the SA closure process
Amounts after FRS  will go to OA.
I'm talking abt after 55 yr old..if money goes to OA after FRS is reached  then there is no way we can reach ERS leh
You can still voluntarily contribute to your RA account
I see...meaning we can never exceed ERS? Cos right now before 55 yr old  we can exceed our FRS in SA as a result of salary contribution..so I'm wondering whether is the same for RA after reaching ERS
You can always transfer OA to SA.
Even after our RA reaches ERS?
Good for you  a few friends I send the angpow  all got <100 points or maybe $5 stock voucher only haha
Even after our RA reaches ERS?
Think ERS is the max. Btw  why leave so much in RA
This is just a hypothetical question... for better understanding
Possible if your RA interest is above following year's ERS increment.
Really? Is this a fact or is this a guess? Haha. I tot the excess will flow to the OA?
Theoretical based on CPF's policy.MA excess will flow to OA if RA/SA already FRS.
Thanks for trying to answer my question bro Melvyn...but U are confusing me more... sometimes U talk abt SA  sometimes U talk abt RA...do U know what I am asking actually? Haha
At 55  SA is closed with RA formed with FRS amount. login to CPF and transfer excess OA to RA to reach ERS.

Yes understand this part. So assuming I transfer excess OA to RA to reach ERS  and I am still working  will my RA exceed ERS since my salary is still credited every month? Cos right now our SA can exceed FRS due to salary credit. I'm just wondering whether this is the same for RA after we achieved ERS.
